mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM log2timeline

SELECT case_id, evd_id, par_id, os_type, product_name, release_id, os_version, build_version, product_id, owner, DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(install_date), '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as install_date FROM OSInstallation
limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM OSInstallation

SELECT case_id, evd_id, par_id, storage_type, device_name, serial_number, device_type, first_connect_time, first_disconnect_time, first_connect_time_after_last_boot, first_disconnect_time_after_last_boot, last_connect_time FROM StorageDevice
limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM StorageDevice

SELECT case_id, evd_id, par_id, app_name, app_version, publisher, installation_path, source_path FROM InstalledApp
limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM InstalledApp

SELECT case_id, evd_id, par_id, browser_type, time_type, time, visit_url, title, visit_count FROM WebHistory
limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM WebHistory

SELECT case_id, evd_id, par_id, browser_type, time_type, down_time, down_url, save_path, file_size FROM WebDownload
limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM WebDownload

SELECT case_id, evd_id, par_id, browser_type, time_type, time, cache_url, cache_name, cache_size, mime_type FROM WebCache
limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM WebCache

SELECT case_id, evd_id, par_id, browser_type, time_type, time, host_url, path, cookie_key, cookie_value FROM WebCookie
limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM WebCookie

select source, date_format(datetime, '%m/%d/%Y %h:%i:%s %p') as date, count(*) as cnt from log2timeline where 1=1
group by source, datetime order by source, datetime

SELECT case_id, evd_id, par_id, app_id, app_name, target_file_path, arguments, volume_name, volume_serial_number, target_file_created_time, target_file_last_modified_time, target_file_last_accessed_time, jump_list_type, drive_type, computer_name, target_mac_address, target_file_size, entry_created_time, entry_last_accessed_time, entry_id, most_recent_used, interaction_count, target_file_attributes, target_id_absolute_path, target_mft_entry_number, target_mft_sequence_number, pin_status, file_birth_droid, volume_birth_droid, file_droid, volume_droid FROM lv1_os_win_jumplist where case_id = #{case_id} and evd_id = #{evd_id}
limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
